Text.content:
The Job advertisment is a specialized content for creating job offers. It can contain several paragraphs and images, as well as information about location, start and end date etc. The Job advertisment is similar to the Article. Compared to the much simpler Content Section the Job advertisment is a semantic entity.

The full content of an Job advertisment is usually displayed on a Detail page that is accessed through a List like the one below.
